name: cmake
description: 跨平台构建系统生成工具，用于为不同的构建工具（如Makefile、Ninja）生成构建配置文件。

options.description: Explicitly specify a source directory
Explicitly specify a build directory
Pre-load a script to populate the cache
Create or update a cmake cache entry
Remove matching entries from CMake cache
Specify a build system generator
Specify toolset name if supported by generator
Specify platform name if supported by generator

Specify install directory [CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX]
Specify an alternate project file name

Suppress developer warnings

Make developer warnings not errors

Suppress deprecation warnings

Install a CMake-generated project binary tree. Run "cmake --install" to see compatible options and a quick help

View mode only
Process script mode
Legacy pkg-config like mode. Do not use

Print CMake config directory for user-wide FileAPI queries

Prepend log messages with context, if given
Do not delete the try_compile build tree. Only useful on one try_compile at a time

Put cmake find in a debug mode

Limit cmake debug-find to the comma-separated list of result variables

Don't warn about command line options

Ignore LINK_WARNING_AS_ERROR property and CMAKE_LINK_WARNING_AS_ERROR variable
Output data for profiling CMake scripts. Supported formats: google-trace
Select an output path for the profiling data enabled through --profiling-format

name: cpack
description: CMake 打包工具，用于将 CMake 构建的项目打包为各种格式的安装包或压缩包

name: ctest
description: CMake 测试工具，用于执行 CMake 项目中定义的测试用例，支持并行执行、测试过滤和结果输出

options.description: Read arguments from a test preset.
List available test presets.
Choose configuration to test.
Enable short progress output from tests.
Enable verbose output from tests.
Enable more verbose output from tests.
Displaying more verbose internals of CTest.
Output anything outputted by the test program if the test should fail.
Stop running the tests after one has failed.
Limit the output for passed tests to <size> bytes
Limit the output for failed tests to <size> bytes
Truncate 'tail' (default), 'middle' or 'head' of test output once maximum output size is reached
Enable failover.
Run tests in parallel, optionally limited to a given level of parallelism.
Make ctest quiet.
Output to log file
Output test results to JUnit XML file.
Disable actual execution of tests.  The optional 'format' defines the format of the test information and can be 'human' for the current text format or 'json-v1' for json format.  Defaults to 'human'.
Run tests with labels matching regular expression.  With multiple -L, run tests where each regular expression matches at least one label.
Run tests matching regular expression.
Exclude tests matching regular expression.
Exclude tests with labels matching regular expression.  With multiple -LE, exclude tests where each regular expression matches at least one label.
Do not automatically add any tests for fixtures matching regular expression.
Do not automatically add setup tests for fixtures matching regular expression.
Do not automatically add cleanup tests for fixtures matching regular expression.

Run tests except those listed in the given file
